Package in.com.app.background

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundServerConnectionManagerDisplay
    This class is wrapper for a asyncTask that checks if STB is registered on server.
    BackgroundServerDownloadIndividualFilesDisplay
    This class is wrapper for a asyncTask that downloads individualfiles from server in the background.
    BackgroundServerGetFilesDisplay
    This class is wrapper for a asyncTask that downloads list of files used in the current layout from server in background.
    BackgroundServerGetScheduleDisplay
    This class is wrapper for a asyncTask that downloads schedule of the layout to be displayed.
    StateMachineDisplay
    This is Class that changes state of processes in the background
